message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be valuable to you. Our initial offer for the product is $950000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking for a more affordable solution. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. We're willing to consider your proposal, but we need to maintain a fair valuation for our product. Our counteroffer is $900000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of your product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. We value your interest in our product. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, we propose a counteroffer of $890000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $885000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We understand your position and would like to propose a counteroffer of $888000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. Considering my financial situation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $886000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your efforts to find a mutual agreement. Our final counteroffer is $887000.
Thank you for your final counteroffer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $886500.
